channel.title: Shop? Won't work? I see you npc
channel.description:
alright, I've followed this tut to make a shop with a npc. THE NPC IS THERE :) The shop is made, but he won't sell st00f?
autospawn:
[code]spawn = 2825 3255 3436 0 3255 3436 3255 3436 1 Pirate Pete[/code]
Shop [code]shop = 42 Pirate_Pete[/code] (the items are there i just don't want people to take :'(
client
[code] } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 2825) { //Pirate Pete PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Pirate Shop } else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true;[/code]

item.title: Shop? Won't work? I see you npc
